name: Beat The Arena
description:
Beat The Arena as a main Goal, Beat the Arena !!

In the first Official Public release, you will be able to beat multiple Levels, with multiple ennemies, wich will have multiple special abilities, and you will need to get some skill to Beat the whole arena. You will be able to unlock multiple special attacks, two are on test with the available version.

Actually, you have 4 firing modes: AR mode, Minigun Mode, Sniper Mode and Laser Mode

There is 10 waves with a Boss at the end. 

You have 2 super powers: The Earthquake (F), and the ShockWave (G)

Earthquake kills ennemies around you, and shockwave stunt ennemies on the Arena for 5 seconds.

Multiple bonus like shields, slow-motion bonus, heal bonus and more will come later ;)

Boss is not so easy to beat ;)
